name: HotUKDeals Tight Layout
description: Updated styles for the new 2017 layout, aiming at reducing padding and the amount of vertical space used by the site
additional_info:
Update 2018-11-01:
Change to handle category layout update to reduce height
Update for Deal titles on list view to have title and price run together as one 'line' of content

Update 2018-10-13:
Fix for floating temperature icons (seemed to happen even without these overrides)
Fix for double scrollbar issue

Update 2018-08-22:
Some tweaks applied to adjust for some recent changes to the site layout

Update 2018-01-17:
Update to handle changed layout on the site

Update 2017-10-12:
Reduced list image size on the Compact view

Update 2017-10-11:
Initial update for new list layout introduced today.  Still needs some work, but my old styles were causing a broken layout, so better to have a quick fix for that!
Still focused on keeping vertical space to a minimum.

Update 2017-09-29:
Updated to handle the altered markup for the Group header
Narrowed the whitespace above and below the paging elements at the top of a list

Original:
Only the main list page updated so far, not sure if I'll approach other screens or not.

Space between deals is reduced
Passing in deal box is reduced
Category tags hidden
Title and Poster text updated to run in together
Category header reduced
Hot/New/Discussed menu tabs reduced
Expired Items are set with a reduced font size

Note: Not tested on mobile view or for impact on other screens (though I've not noticed anything yet)
